comments.text:
I am currently working on a Test Strategy document for Firefox Telemetry and wish to include a section that provides an overview over the different test-suites for Firefox Telemetry. Ideally this document would associate a test-level to each test-suite (for example: unit, integration, etc.), an example issue that a test-suite would be able to identify (for example: integration tests would be able to detect if Firefox failed to start telemetry), information about how and when the test-suite is run (for example: per push to mozilla-central on CI tier 1), and who's owning the test-suite (for example: telemetry-tests-client is managed by chutten and raphael).

Last week, chutten and I talked about such a document and I'd be more than happy to help!
